#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  long long int pre[17],t,n,k,i,tmp,rem,j;
  for(i=1;i<=16;i++)
  	pre[i]=i*pow(10,i-1)*9;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
  	cin>>n>>k;
	tmp=k; i=1;
	while(tmp>pre[i])
	{
		tmp=tmp-=pre[i];
		i++;
	}
	// i is number of digit and tmp is index
	rem=tmp%i; // rem is given the place of index( 0th 10th 100th etc)
	tmp=tmp/i; 
	tmp=tmp+pow(10,i-1)-1; // previous number
	
	if(rem==0)	printf("%d\n",tmp%10);
	else
	{
		tmp++; // the current number
		for(j=1;j<=i-rem;j++)
		tmp/=10;
		printf("%d\n",tmp%10);
	}
  }
  return 0;
}
